casebody.data:
Daneil SARROUF & another1
v.
CITY OF BOSTON & another.2 18-P-565 Appeals Court of Massachusetts. Entered: May 20, 2019

The order allowing Boston Gas Company's motion for a directed verdict is reversed, the judgment in favor of Boston Gas Company is vacated, and the case is remanded to the Superior Court for further proceedings consistent with the memorandum and order of the Appeals Court.*
